Reviews.Title: Low cost alternative to Samsung Note
Reviews.Author: Jerry Chu
Reviews.Content: What I really want is a no-contract Samsung Note, but I don't want to pay more than $400 for a phone. After much research I settled on the BLU 5.3 II. It has the 3G frequency I need (I'm on Ptel, which uses T-mobile network).The screen is big and beautiful. There's a protective film over it, which I leave on as screen protector. Everything worked as expected. The only thing that gives a hint this is low cost device is the back-light of the 3 touch buttons below the screen. The back light comes from the left and it shows.Speaker quality is good. The 2 LED flash light, front camera, dual SIM (I travel abroad every year) are nice additions.Android 4.1 is much better than 3.2 on my old Samsung Galaxy. Very responsive. But I hate the Google search bar that occupies home screen space. So I downloaded EZ Launcher and got rid of it.Over all very happy with the features, quality and price.

Reviews.Title: Great phone and wonderful service from the seller. Wish all my purchases were this great.
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: Just received the phone from UPS and plugged it in for several hours just to make sure it was full charged. It was 35% charged when I plugged it in. I started with getting the inhouse WIFI to work and it accepted that on the first try. Then easily downloaded several apps. The bank APP and was able to get on line with the bank right off. Then I went to Yahoo and signed in and downloaded the Facebook APP. from then on it was smooth sailing to what ever I wanted to do. Screen went off several times on me so I went to Settings and clicked on Display and up'ed the time out to 20minutes. That made it only dim down occasionally and it is just a tap to get it to full bright. I'll do something else later. Don't have a sim card for it yet so I might have to come back to that but I feel that will be as easy to get signed on to either Straight Talk or T Mobile. Not sure who is bettercause I have been on Verizon for ten years and decided they were too expensive. I don;t care for just 500 MB of on line time. Should be at least a Gig as other services do.Best of all the phone was easy to use and easy to read even the smallest print was able to read and I am 78 years old so a younger person should have no problem. LOL Everyone seems to be younger than me......The phone is really high quality and I am proud of my purchase. I love the white and the way it feels very feminine. The CPU is fast too. I can;t type as fast as it is able to take my texting. I am pretty good too with texting to all my grand kids and family. This is my tenth phone and I have had computers sense 1985. Windows 3.0 was my first with MSDOS on a Packard Bell computer. I only hope it last a while and gives long service. I really love it and plan to buy another one for my sister and partner. I really examined the fleet of phones available and decided on this one as it has G3 850/1900. The rest couldn't go G3 cause it had only G3 850/2100 which if for Europe Systems. This is something to look out for unless you want to be stuck on G2 all the time........The top center button is the on button and when you put the back on put the back over that button and continue down to snap the back on. That will save you from reading the whole book to find out how to get it up and running. GOOD LUCK

Reviews.Title: Big Beautiful Screen
Reviews.Author: karen anne callaway
Reviews.Content: Very nice phone..has all I need in it. Mostly do my bills, check email/facebook, go on web to check things. I sometimes get a call but mostly send & receive texts and check my voicemail. It has just about everything that the name brand version of S G 3 or 4 has without paying an outrageous amount of money for it. Pretty to look at and I love the huge screen...I have vision problems and could hardly see things on my old phone...I can clearly see everything on this one. Thank You!

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine. My girlfriend uses constantly. My only issue with it is it seems to be unsupported. If there are never any software updates,  the phone will be outdated soon. No cm or aopk support either.

Reviews.Title: blu studio 5.3II 550a
Reviews.Author: mike216
Reviews.Content: The phone works great on T-Mobile with 3g/hspd speeds are great also. I found the galaxy note accessories work well with phone with a little alterations.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: BookWarrior
Reviews.Content: Arrived quick and my 18yr old daughter had wanted a Samsung note.  Well I couldn't spend that much so we tried this and she loves it.  It's like a smartphone and a smaller tablet all in one.  Now that we've discovered Blu, we will never use other brands anymore.  I will be a customer for life!

Reviews.Title: LUV my BLU Cell Phone!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: CHELLA 67
Reviews.Content: I luv this phone. It works well with straight talk. It is hard to find a case that will fit this phone. The case that I receive is ok for right know. This is a good phone for 1/2 the price as samsung, and works just as well. I had a samsung note 2, drop it one time and it has not came on since. I have dropped this phone 3 time and it is still kicking. LUV, LUV, LUV  BLU cell phone.

Reviews.Title: The next big THING!
Reviews.Author: anthony gibbs
Reviews.Content: great phone for the money, quality made and looks nicewhat would give it 5 rating is only 3g and speaker are subpar.with wifi excellent. Would recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: u get what u paid for..
Reviews.Author: Michael Delgado
Reviews.Content: I  bought this phone about 1-2 yrs ago..n now I'm buying another phone..the phone itself works fine..it has a nice size screen ,I was able to get on FB,Instagram,amazon etc with no problem..e-mail work great..youtube did suck it kept freezing up..the phone at times went blank while talking on it..the screen blinks on n off at times that really erked me cause I couldn't end a call or start a new one..n the GPS worked ok but I had problems getting it to locate my destinations..from time to time..now the camera..the camera worked fine the flash is bright but the pictures are ok front camera only worked in well lit places...the phone has dropped over a million times n never gave me any problems n the screen never cracked,bust,etc..

Reviews.Title: I really like my new phone
Reviews.Author: Alan Hartt
Reviews.Content: I really like my new phone. It has same features as big name phones costing 2-3 times more. The big screen is great for viewing web pages, pictures etc. It is a bigger phone than the regular size ones, with 5.3" screen so be aware of that. I have had no issues putting phone in me jeans pocket and go.It comes with a back silicone cover, and I could not find any other covers online to put on it. Not a big deal for me, but might put some off. Comes with it's own charger and earbuds, so all in one package.I haven't used the dual sim yet, but could be nice feature down the road. I put in a 32GB micro sd flash card, so plenty of space for pics, videos and apps. Recommend on any phone to move apps to sd card for better performance.If you want great phone at great price, you should consider this one.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Lender
Reviews.Content: Brand, satisfied with the product, good phone components, work in 3g with my operator, thank you very much from Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Jolando Thornton
Reviews.Content: The phone overall was very nice! The company that I bought it from (BREED) was very helpful because when I received it it had a broken power button but I contacted them and they helped me to be able to receive a new one. I will give this phone a five star rating because it is one of the best phones I have ever had!Thank You!!!!!

Reviews.Title: blu 5.3 !!
Reviews.Author: Todd Hasan
Reviews.Content: it was a new phone and I came across a blue 5.0 I like the way it work so I upgraded to this The phone works wonderful The only problem that I have with it is that the charger connector on the phone is weak Mines broke so now I'm dealing with batteries and chargers.there was only a 30 day warranty so I missed that I'm not going to get it fixed. I'm just going to keep on charging batteries. Besides that its a great phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: betsy
Reviews.Content: Get a lot of compliments . Great pictures Netflix movies really look good on phone sound not as good but better than my iphone

Reviews.Title: It's decent
Reviews.Author: Rich L.
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife after she broke her phone and needed a cheap off-contract replacement for the time being. The specs are mediocre and the phone lags a bit but it does what it's supposed it. There is, however, a small but significant glitch with the phone: the screen goes dim after like three seconds no matter what your screen/sleep settings are. You have to download an app to keep the screen set to "always on" and if you forget to hit the power button after you're done, your battery will drain from the screen being on. Don't know if it's just this phone or all of the studio 5.3ii's but it's something to think about.

Reviews.Title: its a great phone and great signal and it look like galaxy note.
Reviews.Author: Adi A.
Reviews.Content: Its a great phone and great signal and it look like galaxy note and it took very nice picture too.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Rodney wingate
Reviews.Content: Good phone for the price no problems as of yet I love it. If you want a phone that isn't going to hurt your pockets this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: very good phone
Reviews.Author: Efrem Reed
Reviews.Content: This was my first blue phone. The phone is self is very good but had to send it back because of no swype and kept dimming after 5 seconds!!!!

Reviews.Title: Problem with the batterry
Reviews.Author: roger morris
Reviews.Content: I like the phone , but I am having problem with the BATTERY, I have to charge it TWICE A DAY? My brother  in Law have one and he does not have to do that.

Reviews.Title: will never purchase again
Reviews.Author: unsatisfied customer
Reviews.Content: I was so unhappy with the company & Amazon. I thought I was buying unlocked phones & when I was putting my minutes & data on the phones the company told me that I couldn't get the data until I got the phones unlocked. Question. Why should I pay to get my phone unlocked if I bought it as an unlocked phone? Anybody. ..

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked Dual SIM, 4GB storage; Android OS, v4.1 (Jelly Bean), Micro SD up to 32GB
2G Network GSM 850/900/1800/1900   3G Network HSDPA 850/1900
5.3" High Resolution Display: qHD (540x960 pixels)
8MP Camera with LED Flash with HD recording (720p), 2MP Front Camera for Video Calling and instant self portraits.
3.5mm Audio Jack,FM Radio, MP3 Player, MP4 Player
ProductInfo.Name: Blu Studio 5.3 II D550A (3G 850/1900MHz) Unlocked Dual Sim Phone with Dual-Core 1GHz Processor, Android 4.1, 5.3-inch IPS Capacitive Touch, and 8MP Camera - U.S. Warranty (White)
